_description: A morning grace — two couplets introduced by ‘Wanne þe sunne rist’ in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Þe day taket his lith MisericoriaÞeues taken here flith
                    DemonesÞe deu ginnet springge Gracis[…] singge
                    […]
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 18.
